1.「おお <pc>。来てくれたか。| じつはな そちに 頼みがある。| これが 余: oh!<pc> Come on. I need you... Actually, I'm asking|you... This will be the last thing I ask of|you...

2.「余の最後の頼みとは……| 我が祖国 ガテリア皇国を探す| 手伝いをしてほしいの: My last request... I need your help to find|my homeland, the Empire of Gateria.

3.「……みなまで申すな。| ガテリアが すでに存在しないのは 重々承知。| しかし: ... Until now... Gateria doesn't exist|anymore. It's heavy... But...

Like Urbea, it's in a state of decay... ...|If we can find the remains of the Empire of|Gateria, we might be able to find them, don't|
|you think?

5.「余は 見てみたくなったのじゃ。| かつて 父上や母上 そして……| リウ老師と: I'm curious to see... I wanted to see what my|father, my mother... I spent time with Master|Liu.

6.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: In the throne room of my homeland are those|closest to me. And if I can remember them, I|can walk again.

|the far west of this continent...

8.「<pc>よ。ガテリアの遺跡を見つけ| 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。: <pc> I'll go. Find me the remains of the Gateria|and lead me to the throne room. Please, will|you fulfill this last wish?

9.「そうか！ やってくれるか！| 本当に…… 本当に| そちに 出会えて よかった: Oh, yeah! You'll do it! I'm so... I'm really|glad I found you!

10.「それでは ボロヌス溶岩流に行き| ガテリアの遺跡を探すとしよう。| 余は そち: Okay, so we're going to the Voronus Lava Flow|to find the remains of Gateria... I'll be|right behind you.

12.「話を聞いてりゃ アンタ……。| 身寄りが いねえみたいですなッ！: If you ask me, you... You don't seem to have|any relatives!

13.「もし 行くあてがねえんなら| 養子にでもしてやるでごぜえますよッ！| ここを: If you have nowhere else to go, I'll adopt|you! Just think of this place as your home!

15.「カッ カン違いしねえでくだせえッ！| わしは アンタの その…ガラクタの知識を: Don't get the wrong idea! I'm just buying|your... I'm just buying your garbage|knowledge!

16.「ダストン殿……。| 見かけによらず 貴公は 優しいのであるな。| その申し出: Lord Daston... You're not as kind as you|seem, my lord. I'm grateful for your offer.

17.「……じゃが 余は 行かねばならぬ。| 祖国の今を 見届けねば 余の時間は| 止: ... But I must go. If I don't see what my|country has become, I feel as if my time has|come to a standstill.

18.「<pc>よ。それでは 参ろうか。| 目指すは ボロヌス溶岩流の東に眠る| ガテ: <pc> Okay. Okay, let's go. We're aiming for the|remains of the Empire of Gateria, lying east|of the Voronus Lava Flow...

19.「……ムムッ！| そちは 他の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており| 余の頼みは 受け: ... Mmm! I'm afraid you have too many other|things on your plate to accept my request.

20.「まあ こちらは 一刻を争うわけでもない。| 急ぎの依頼を 片付けたら| 余を: Well, we're in a bit of a hurry here, so...|I've got an urgent matter to take care of,|and I need your help.

21.「……そうかえ。| ならば いたしかたなし。| そちの気が変わるまで 待つことに: ... So... Then we'll have to... I'll wait|until you change your mind...

27.「余の祖国 ガテリア皇国の遺跡は| きっと この大陸の西の果てにある| ボロヌス: The ruins of my homeland, the Empire of|Gateria, must lie in the far west of this|continent, east of the Voronus Lava Flow.

28.「余と共に ボロヌス溶岩流に行き| ガテリアの遺跡を見つけたら| 奥の玉座の間ま: I'll take you to the Voronus lava flow, and|when we find the remains of Gateria, you'll|take me to the inner throne room...

29.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: In the throne room of my homeland are those|closest to me. And if I can remember them, I|can walk again.

30.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。| 頼んだぞよ <pc>。: This is the last thing I'm asking you to do.|I'm begging you.<pc> 。

31.「そちのおかげで ボロヌス溶岩流に眠る| ガテリア皇国の遺跡は 見つかったぞよ。: Thanks to you, we've found the remains of the|Empire of Gateria lying in the Voronezh Lava|Flow... I am truly impressed.

32.「あとは その奥にあるはずの| 玉座の間まで 余を 連れていってたもれ。: Now, I need you to take me to the throne|room, which is supposed to be behind it.

33.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: In the throne room of my homeland are those|closest to me. And if I can remember them, I|can walk again.

34.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。| 頼んだぞよ <pc>。: This is the last thing I'm asking you to do.|I'm begging you.<pc> 。

35.「おお……！ ついに……| ついに 見つけてくれたのじゃな……。| <pc>よ…: Oh...! At last... You found me at last.<pc> よ...

36.「かように 変わり果てても| 悲しいほど 余には わかるぞえ……。: I know how sad it is to see you change like|this.

37.「まちがいない。| この地こそ 我が祖国ガテリアじゃ……。: This town... This is the land of my homeland,|Gateria...

38.「祖国といえど 父上も母上も……| 親しい者は 皆 すでに ここにはおらぬ。|: Even in my homeland, my father, my mother...|Everyone close to me is already here. I knew|it, but it's still hard...

39.「……さあ <pc>。| 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。| きっと こ: Come on<pc> No! Take me to the throne room... I'm sure|it's in there.

41.「この部屋こそ 余の思い出が詰まった| ガテリア皇国の玉座の間……。| ついに: This is the throne room of the Empire of|Gateria... where all my memories are stored.|You have finally arrived...

42.「……こうしていると 在りし日のガテリアが| 目に 浮かぶようじゃ。: ... As I look at you, I can see the Gateria|of old...

43.「……父上が 威風堂々と玉座に座ると| その隣で 母上が 余に笑いかけた。| そ: ... As your father sits on his throne with|dignity, your mother smiles at him. And|then...

44.「決まった時間になると リウ老師が| 嬉しそうに 余を迎えにくる……。: At the appointed time, Master Liu would|happily come to pick me up...

50.「ど どこから わいて 出おった！？| かような お化けフンコロガシ……| 余の: Where did that thing come from? Such a|monstrous dung beetle... I didn't see any in|my gateria!

51.「<cs_pchero> 頼むッ！！| 神聖な玉座の間を汚す 不届き者の| フン: <cs_pchero>Please! I beg you, avenge me! I beg you,|avenge me!

52.「よいか <cs_pchero>！| あの お化けフンコロガシを見かけたら| 次: evening song<cs_pchero>Hey! The next time you see that ghost beetle,|you'd better show me something!

54.「で 出たぁぁぁッ！！| 頼んだぞよ <cs_pchero>！！: And there it is! I'm counting on you.<cs_pchero>No!

55.「おお！ 不届きな お化けフンコロガシを| 見事 成敗してくれたようじゃな！|: Oh! It looks like you've successfully|defeated the evil monster beetle! Well done.<cs_pchero>！

56.「……かような化け物が すみつくとは| 本当に ガテリアは 時代から| 見捨てら: ... Gateria has truly been abandoned by the|times, that such a monster would settle|here...

57.「……<cs_pchero>よ。| 今こそ 余が ここへ来た| 本当の理由を話そ: <cs_pchero>Now is the time. Now is the time for you to|tell me the real reason I'm here.

58.「余は……| ここで 自らの生を 終えようと思う。: I will... I will end my life here.

59.「止めないでたもれ……！| 大事な者たちとの思い出に ふれながら| この世を去る: Please don't stop me. If I can leave this|world with the memories of those I love,|then...

60.「そちには 本当に世話になった。| 心の底から 感謝してるぞよ。| では さらば: You've been so good to me. Thank you from the|bottom of my heart. Well, goodbye...

63.「魔神兵……！？| なぜ あの魔神兵が ガテリアにおる！？: The Demon Soldier...? Why is that demon|soldier in Gateria?

64.「まさか リウ老師か！？| この中に リウ老師が入っておるのか！？| 早く… 早: No way. It's Master Liu! Is that Master Liu|in there? Quickly... Come on, show me what's|inside!

65.「会いたかったぞよ！！| リウ……: I've missed you so much! Liu...

67.「ふふふ……。やはり……な。| 魔神兵の中は もぬけのカラ……。| もう リウ老: Hmmm... I knew it. .... The demon soldiers|are empty... Master Liu is no longer with|us...

68.「……これは リウ老師の手紙か！？| 老師が 余に 手紙を……！: ... Is this Master Liu's letter? Master Liu|wrote to me.

69.「……親愛なる我が主 ビャン・ダオさま。| リウにございます。: ... My dear Lord, Byan Da... This is for|Liu...

70.「……ビャン皇子を魔神兵に乗せた後| 私は このガテリアまで 戻ってまいりました:
... After taking Prince Biang on the demon|soldiers, I'll return to Gateria... To keep|my promise to meet the prince in the|
|future...

71.「……しかし 私は 魔神兵に乗れなかった。| 皇子の後を追って 未来へ行くという: ... But I can't ride a demon soldier... I|couldn't choose to follow the prince to the|future...

72.「私は 文明に影を落とした 技術者のひとり。| その大いなる罪を つぐなうべく|: I have decided to end my life in this age...|I have decided to end my life in this age to|atone for their great sins...

73.「……皇子の生きる未来に| 正しい文明の姿を 取り戻すため| この身を賭して 戦: ... I've decided to fight with all my might|to restore the proper form of civilization to|the prince's future.

75.「ドワーフたちが 同じ過ちを繰り返したとき| あなたならば きっと 正しき道へと: When the dwarves repeat their mistakes,|perhaps you can lead them back to the path of|righteousness.

77.「……ビャンさま。あなたが 成人したら| とっておきの技術を 教えるという約束を: ... Vya... Do you remember that I promised to|teach you some of my most prized skills when|you came of age?

78.「今こそ その約束を果たすとき……。| さあ 魔神兵の中に入っているモノを| お: Now is the time to fulfill that promise. Now,|please accept what's inside the Demon|Soldier...

80.「……かつて ドワーフたちは| 他の種族と同じく 自らの手で タネを植え| その: ... Once upon a time, dwarves, like many|other races, planted seeds with their own|hands and rejoiced in the harvest.

81.「……しかし 我らは 高度な技術におぼれ| 自らのチカラで 成しとげる よろこび:
... But we've been so consumed with advanced|technology that we've lost sight of the true|meaning of civilization. We've lost sight of|
|the true meaning of civilization...

82.「私が ビャンさまに託したかった技術とは……| 自らのチカラで 生き抜く術だった: The skill I wanted to entrust to you, Master|Byan... It was the art of surviving on one's|own...

83.「ビャンさま…… どうか お元気で……。| あなたとの約束を守れなかった| 私め: Mr. Byan... I hope you are well... Please|forgive me for failing to keep my promise to|you...

84.「老師……。そなたは 何も わかっておらぬ。| 余が欲しかったのは こんな手紙で: Master... You don't know anything... This is|not the letter I wanted... Not this letter...

85.「リウ老師……。余は ただ 一目だけでも| そなたに 会いたかったのじゃ……。: Master Liu... I just wanted to see you for|the first time...

86.「……だが その思いは 受け取ったぞ。| リウ老師よ……。: ... But I know that you feel the same way.|Master Liu...

87.「……そなたは 望んでおったのだな。| 技術に身をまかせた ゆがんだ時代を終わら:
... You've always wanted... You wanted to end|the warped age of technology and make the|world exactly what it is now. ...I'm sorry. I've decided... I have decided to|live in this age... I wanted to see... I|wanted to see... I wanted to see what Master|
|Liu wanted for this world. I couldn't have|understood Master Liu's teachings just by|reading this letter. But now I know... You|
|and Chili taught me the importance of not|relying on technology but on our own|strength.

88.「<cs_pchero>。そちには 本当に世話になった。| 感謝しても しきれぬ: <cs_pchero>I'm sorry. I'm really indebted to you... I|can't thank you enough, but this is the least|I can do... Please accept it...

89.「……余は これから リウ老師の教えに従い| 旅に出ようと思う。この手で タネを:
... I will now follow Master Liu's teachings|and begin my journey. With my hands, I will|plant the seed. With my feet, I will find my|
|place in the world.

90.「ふふふ……。そちたちのおかげで| 止まっていた余の時間が 動きだしたようじゃ。: Hmmm... Thanks to you, the rest of my time|has come to a halt... I'm excited to meet new|people!

91.「それでは また会おう！ <cs_pchero>よ！| ガラクタ城の皆にも よろ: I'll see you around!<cs_pchero>Hey! Give my regards to everyone at the junk|castle!
